history.proof: intros I A B C H_iso H_milieu. destruct H_milieu as [H_colineaire H_consequence]. apply H_consequence in H_iso. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros I A B C H_iso H_milieu.
exceptions.exn: In environment I, A, B, C : PO H_iso : orthogonal (vec A I) (vec B C) H_colineaire : colineaire (vec B I) (vec B C) H_consequence : forall A : PO, isocele A B C -> bissectrice I A B C Unable to unify "orthogonal (vec A I) (vec B C)" with "bissectrice I A B C".

original: intros I A B C H_iso H_milieu. destruct H_milieu as [H_colineaire H_consequence]. apply H_consequence in H_iso. apply isocele_bissectrice_hauteur in H_iso. apply H_iso.
